name: Sleep
description: I will sleep for 4 hours at a time, but only if I'm not fighting or paralyzed.

name: Walk
description: I will move at normal speed.

name: Code
description: I will use my Intelligence modifier to add +1 to any skill check I make to code.

name: Eat
description: I will eat at normal speed.

name: Prayer
description: I will pray at 5 times a dat.
